Template Function rain_freeze¶

  • Defined in File user_functions.h

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
void rain_freeze(float_t &qr_prime, float_t &Nr, float_t &T_prime, const double &dt, std::vector<float_t> &res, model_constants_t &cc)¶

Freezing of rain and conversion to ice, graupel, hail

qr_prime Rain mixing ratio Nr Number of rain droplets T_prime Temperature [K] dt Timestep size [s] res Vector to store the changes cc Model constants
